response.original_title: 修学旅行の夜、こっそり布団の中で何度もイカセてレズに目覚めさせてしまった同級生に数年後…夫が近くにいるのに密着スロー乳首舐めでレズ返しされた私
response.overview: During her school days, Kasumi was in love with a girl in her class. One night, during a school trip, she slipped into her futon and seduced her into a forbidden lesbian encounter. Years later, they meet again, and Hikaru —the girl from back then— has now embraced her lesbian identity. Disappointed to learn that Kasumi is married, Hikaru accepts an invitation to stay at her house. When night falls, she crawls into Kasumi's bed, just as Kasumi once did on that school trip, even though her husband is sleeping beside her…
response.title: Shuugakuryokou no yoru, kossori futon no naka de nando mo ikasete rezu ni mezamesaseteshimatta doukyuusei ni suunen-go… Otto ga chikaku ni iru no ni misshaku suro chikubi name de rezu-gaeshi sareta watashi

titles.title: Shūgakuryokō no yoru, kossori futon no naka de nando mo ikasete rezu ni mezamesaseteshimatta dōkyūsei ni sūnen-go… Otto ga chikaku ni iru no ni misshaku suro chikubi name de rezu-gaeshi sareta watashi

crew.name: Rafting Maeshiro
crew.original_name: ラフティン・マエシロ
